    • Method Detail

      • searchMovie

        public MovieResultsPage searchMovie(java.lang.String query,
                                    java.lang.Integer searchYear,
                                    java.lang.String language,
                                    boolean includeAdult,
                                    java.lang.Integer page)
        Search Movies This is a good starting point to start finding movies on TMDb.
        Parameters:
        query -
        searchYear - Limit the search to the provided year. Zero (0) will get all years
        language - The language to include. Can be blank/null.
        includeAdult - true or false to include adult titles in the search
        page - The page of results to return. 0 to get the default (first page)

        language - The language to include. Can be blank/null.
        page - The page of results to return. 0 to get the default (first page)

        public TmdbPeople.PersonResultsPage searchPerson(java.lang.String query,
                                                 boolean includeAdult,
                                                 java.lang.Integer page)
        This is a good starting point to start finding people on TMDb.

        The idea is to be a quick and light method so you can iterate through people quickly.

      • searchCompany

        public TmdbSearch.CompanyResultsPage searchCompany(java.lang.String companyName,
                                                   java.lang.Integer page)
        Search Companies.

        You can use this method to search for production companies that are part of TMDb. The company IDs will map to those returned on movie calls.

        http://help.themoviedb.org/kb/api/search-companies

        Parameters:
        companyName -
        page -

      • searchMulti

        public TmdbSearch.MultiListResultsPage searchMulti(java.lang.String query,
                                                   java.lang.String language,
                                                   java.lang.Integer page)
        Search the movie, tv show and person collections with a single query.

        Each mapped result is the same response you would get from each independent search.

        Parameters:
        query -
        language -
        page -
        Returns:
        ResultsPage of Multi.
        See Also:
        Multi
